page.title: 10 Sports
page.content: We carried out a survey for sports and recreation in the Springfield area, which is a modern Wimpey estate at the east end of Linlithgow. People seem to take part in a lot of sport.The most popular is swimming, although people have to travel out of Linlithgow unless they take classes at the academy,where there is a small pool. Sports clubs include athletics, angling,badminton,bowling,canoeing, cricket,football,golf,keep fit, orienteering,rugby,sailing,squash and tennis. One of the big complaints about Linlithgow is that it has no swimming pool apart from a private one at the academy.People have to travel to either Bo'ness or Grangemouth,or even over 8 miles to Falkirk for swimming.
